Mozart de Siqueira Campos Araújo Filho

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/6690972001092140
  • Última atualização do currículo em 18/07/2012

Possui graduação em Ciência da Computação pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2001) e mestrado em Ciência da Computação pela mesma universidade na área de Computação Gráfica (2003). Tem experiência em Ciência da Computação, com ênfase em Realidade Virtual, Processamento de Imagens, Algoritmos e Estruturas de Dados, Programação de Aplicações Servidoras, Aplicações para Plataformas Móveis e Programação Web 2.0 (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outras informações
Gerente e pesquisador.


Fundação de Apoio ao Desenvolvimento da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, FADE/UFPE, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2006 - 2010
Vínculo: Celetista formal, Enquadramento Funcional: Softare Architect, Carga horária: 40, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.
Outras informações
Currently working for the SIDI Project, codenamed Groupware. During the first part of this project, we developed a J2ME application that interacts with the Microsoft Exchange Server called Samsung Mobile Business. Under this application development, my work involved the architecture definition, super visioning and implementation of the exchange web protocol through sockets and implementation of a pagination and indexation database platform on the top of the J2ME s Record Management Store. Currently I m one of the two leaders responsible for innovation and the new projects front.


Microsoft Corporation, MC*, Estados Unidos.
Vínculo institucional

2003 - 2006
Vínculo: Celetista formal, Enquadramento Funcional: Engenheiro de Software, Carga horária: 40, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.
Outras informações
Worked for the Exchange Sustained Engineering group. This group is responsible for the creation of hotfixes, service packs and design changes for bugs/new features of already released products. Bellow I have a more detailed experience on the job I did. During this time had experiences in many areas of the exchange mail server: Transport (SMTP, Categorizer and notes connector) Storage CDO (One of the owners of this component) MAPI (One of the owners of this component) IMAIL (One of the owners of this component) OWA Outlook Webclient Access (The main owner of this component) DAVEX/EXOLEDB Responsible for the communication on the web server side with OWA/Storage (The main owner of these components) Had to deal with many of the hottest hotfixes/customer problem examination requests, some of them with millions of dollars in contracts on the line. Involved on war team meetings, politically forced design changes and security issues that needed to be addressed shortly. These are stress related situations since some companies sometimes give a short time for a bug to be fixed before they leak to the press. Many of these situations do not only involve a programming expertise but also some dialog with other teams members and even with customer representatives/upper management in order to try to explain the complexity of the situation. Participated actively on recruiting for the team I work on, doing the Microsoft interview course and working with my peers on questions/tactics used during the interview. Developed two projects during the spare time, one of them to improve the sustained engineering process and another to be released as part of the next years tools of the exchange server. Gave presentations to other teams and to my peers on many technical subjects. Acquired 3 Microsoft certifications during this time.


Centro de Estudos Em Sistemas Avançados do Recife, CESAR, Brasil.
